rules.natural: If an internal audit is conducted on the product line, then the manufacturing process is reviewed for the product line
If the manufacturing process is reviewed for the product line, then provided that the product line fails quality standards, the product line does not have structural defects
If material sourcing is verified for the product line, then when the product line fails quality standards, the product line does not have structural defects
If senior management intervenes in the product line, then the production line is not shut down
Either senior management intervenes in the product line or the quality team escalates issues with the product line
If the engineering department is alerted about the product line, then under the condition that the quality team escalates issues with the product line, the production line is not shut down
Either the engineering department is alerted about the product line or the supply chain department is alerted about the product line
If the supply chain department is alerted about the product line, then given that the quality team escalates issues with the product line, the production line is not shut down
If an external consultant is hired for the product line, then should the product line undergo stress testing, the product line does not have structural defects
Either an external consultant is hired for the product line or competitor analysis is conducted for the product line
If the product line receives quality certification, then the product line passes final inspection
If the product line uses premium materials, then provided that the product line does not meet safety standards, the product line receives quality certification
Either the product line has structural defects or the product line meets safety standards
If the product line undergoes stress testing, then the product line fails quality standards
If customer complaints are received about the product line, then when the product line fails quality standards, the product line does not have structural defects
Either customer complaints are received about the product line or an internal audit is conducted on the product line
If it is not the case that internal audit conducted on the product line leads to material sourcing verified for the product line, then a regulatory investigation is initiated on the product line

If it is not the case that internal audit conducted on the product line results in material sourcing verified for the product line, then a regulatory investigation is not initiated on the product line

If it is not the case that competitor analysis conducted for the product line leads to the situation where product line undergoing stress testing results in product line not having structural defects, then market recall is considered for the product line

If it is not the case that competitor analysis conducted for the product line triggers the condition where product line undergoing stress testing causes product line not having structural defects, then market recall is not considered for the product line
If it is not the case that product line failing quality standards leads to product line not having structural defects, then the production line is shut down
If it is not the case that product line not using premium materials results in product line requiring design redesign, then the production facility implements automated testing
If it is not the case that product line not using premium materials causes product line requiring design redesign, then the production facility does not implement automated testing
If the product line does not meet safety standards, then the product line does not pass final inspection

The product line does not require design redesign
